EFFECT: Send a creature back to its owner's hand. If that creature was a friendly Bird, gain 1 action.
NAME: Send Flying

EFFECT: Powerful. Play condition : there must be at least 2 friendly creatures named [Zephyr] on the Battlefield.
NAME: Falcon

EFFECT: Add a [Zephyr] from your special cards pile to your hand. End your turn immediately.
NAME: Tornado

EFFECT: Special Card. Free. End of your turn : destroy this creature. Destruction : send this card back to your Special Cards Pile.
NAME: Zephyr

EFFECT: Destruction : add an [Ice Crane] from your deck to your hand.
NAME: Ice Crane

EFFECT: Whenever a friendly creature is destroyed : put it back into your hand.
NAME: Dodge

EFFECT: Lose 1 HP. If that HP was a dragon, draw 3 cards. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.
NAME: Burning Pain

EFFECT: Lose 2 HP. Put onto the battlefield any Dragon among HPs lost this way.
NAME: Light it Up

EFFECT: Condition : you must have no cards left in your HP. Bonus effect : draw a card.
NAME: Explosion

EFFECT: Powerful. Destruction : look at your opponent's hand and put a creature onto his battlefield.
NAME: Strongscales

EFFECT: Play Condition : the amount of cards in both player's HP combined must be 7 or less. Impact : your opponent loses HP until he has as many as you.
NAME: Salamander
